recipes.strInstructions: 1. Boil water in a large pot. 2. Add spaghetti and cook until al dente. 3. Drain and serve with sauce of choice.
1. Prepare tortillas. 2. Cook meat with spices. 3. Fill tortillas with meat and vegetables. 4. Top with salsa and cheese.
1. Cook sushi rice. 2. Place rice on seaweed sheet. 3. Add fish and vegetables. 4. Roll tightly and slice.
1. Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices. 2. Cook chicken in butter. 3. Add tomato sauce and simmer. 4. Serve with rice or naan.
1. Slice vegetables thinly. 2. Layer in a baking dish. 3. Drizzle with olive oil and season. 4. Bake until tender.
1. Soak rice noodles. 2. Stir-fry shrimp, tofu, and eggs. 3. Add noodles and sauce. 4. Top with peanuts and lime.
1. Simmer beef bones with spices for broth. 2. Cook rice noodles. 3. Assemble noodles, beef, and herbs in a bowl. 4. Pour hot broth over.
1. Sauté seafood, chicken, and vegetables. 2. Add rice and saffron. 3. Pour in broth and cook until rice is done.
1. Slice and fry eggplant and potatoes. 2. Layer with meat sauce in a dish. 3. Top with béchamel sauce. 4. Bake until golden.
1. Sauté onions, tomatoes, and peppers. 2. Add rice and broth. 3. Cook with spices and vegetables until rice is tender.
